product_specification: minimum hardware requirements for each tier of device required by Dallas ISD. Vendors responding to this RFP must have the ability to provide the District with significant quantities of devices as requested in the pricing lines in this RFP. Note that quantities requested by Dallas ISD are estimates to be ordered over the five years of the contracts resulting from this RFP. Purchases may also include a variety of device accessories which will be ordered in a bundle along with the devices.
